nodes.text: Pich was an Imperial aide for Advisor Coh Veshiv in 0 ABY, at the time that Veshiv was on an inspection tour of the planet Esseles. Aboard the CR90 corvette Empire Forever, Pich, along with fellow aide Vestig, accompanied Veshiv on the Lambda-class T-4a shuttle Myrenia to the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Far Orbit after the EF76's captain, Dhas Fenoep Vedij, claimed that the Far Orbit would be Veshiv's new ship for his travels. However, it was a trap, and the crew of the Far Orbit, who were Alliance to Restore the Republic privateers, captured Veshiv.

Pich was first mentioned in the adventure The Capture of Coh Veshiv from 1998's The Far Orbit Project, by Timothy S. O'Brien. The book was a supplement to West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and was a sequel of sorts to the previous publication Pirates & Privateers, carrying on that book's theme by following the privateering vessel Far Orbit. Pich's fate during Veshiv's capture is unknown, as the capture of Veshiv is played out by the players and is ultimately decided by them.
